title: Ranchero Nachos with Ranchitas Nacho Excitante
ingredients: 1 family-size bag of Ranchitas Nacho Excitante
instructions: Step 1. Heat the oil in a skillet and sauté the chorizo.
Step 2. Add the cooked beans and mix.
Step 3. Season with salt and pepper.
Step 4. Add the ketchup, BBQ sauce, and water.
Step 5. Cook for a couple of minutes until slightly saucy.
Step 6. Serve over the Ranchitas, sprinkle with cheese, and add more BBQ sauce if desired.
description: Ranch-style nachos with chorizo and refried beans. The spicy flavor of Ranchitas Nacho Excitante makes them unforgettable.
